philosophy.short: Movement decides fights. Standing still is dangerous.
philosophy.long: Movement decides fights. Where you stand matters more than how hard you hit. Standing still should feel dangerous.
philosophy.design_intent: Movement should be fluid; terrain should force choices. If a model survives long enough, it was probably moving.

movement_basics.short: Move in inches from base; up to Move per action.
movement_basics.value_usage: Measure in inches from the model's base. Up to full Move value per action.
movement_basics.flexibility: Movement may be split by other actions unless explicitly forbidden (e.g., Move-Attack-Move).

difficult.effect: Movement is halved (round down). Does not stack with other move penalties.

impassable.effect: Cannot enter, pass through, or end movement inside. Blocks LoS if solid.

model_interaction.friendly_models: May move through if space allows and bases do not overlap at the end.

engagement_and_pressure.definition: Engaged when within melee range of an enemy model.
engagement_and_pressure.lock_in: No universal lock-in; engaged models may move freely unless an ability says otherwise.

melee_pressure_penalty.restriction: Does not apply to melee attacks.

verticality.climbing: Measure vertical distance normally. Terrain may be impassable vertically or require specific actions.

trait_priority.logic: Resolve movement first, then resolve terrain effects.
